Copy and paste the following into the top of the <body> tag:

<div class="menuIcon" onclick="openNav()"><img src="assets/menu_icon.svg"/></div>
<div id="sideNav" class="sideNav">
  <h1>Menu</h1>
  <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="closebtn" onclick="closeNav()">&times;</a>
  <a href="docs/atlas_detector/index.html">1</a>
  <a href="#">2</a>
  <a href="#">2</a>
  <a href="#">4</a>
</div>
